actions.description: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down)
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d12 + 3 + the spell's level cold damage
actions.name: Chilling Rend

actions.description: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success
actions.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)

actions.description: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit takes the Hide action
actions.name: [Bonus Action] Shadow Stealth (Fear only)

languages: understands the languages its summoner speaks
name: Shadow Spirit

specialTraits.description: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures
specialTraits.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury only)

specialTraits.description: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn
specialTraits.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair only)
